items.sentence: Tom is never going to finish the job he started.
Tom is the only person who knows how to do this.
Tom knew what Mary was planning to buy for John.
Tom laughed when I told him about what happened.

We\'ve got other things we need to be doing now.
That\'s a filthy job and I don\'t want to do it.
The bank around the corner was robbed yesterday.
The cake that Tom baked looked really delicious.
Due to the bad weather, the game was called off.
